/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a vibrant contrast against the clear blue sky. A large blue truck with a flatbed trailer is making its way down the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The bright sunlight illuminates the scene, casting shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees.
